title: Pushpa Chakra Ring - Kundan and Ruby Floral Statement
materials: 22K Gold Plated base metal. Features high-quality Kundan stones (Polki Diamonds Simulants) and square-cut Rubies. Finished with a protective Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Intricate floral design inspired by the 'Pushpa Chakra' motif. The central cluster showcases brilliant Kundan stones, each meticulously set by hand. The contrasting square-cut rubies add a pop of color and enhance the overall allure. Modern design making it a versatile ring.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranthi
or adding a touch of elegance to your everyday ensemble. A sophisticated addition to your ring collection.
description: This Kundan ring is a statement piece, that will certainly garner attention. Crafted with precision and attention to detail, reflecting the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The contrasting colors and floral design make it a captivating accessory.
